page.title: 15Housing
page.content: The area in question can be broadly sub divided into two. Firstly the area to the extreme north west corner known as Upper Ventnor and Lowtherville. Here the preponderance is rented local authority provided house and flat type accomodation. The planners arranged this along with adjacent schools and light industrial units (neither of which come within this area). The majority of the remainder of housing which is for the main piecemeal speculative type development is private and because of the local beauty with repect to landscape and ecology the developments have tended to be of a better quality in a higher than average price range. There is no problem with slum clearance but only with the perennial task of finding suitable building land where permission for housing is possible.
